channel.title: Server
channel.description: Click run in the client and says server is on but when i try to login i get an error connecting to server. Yes I've already ported ect ect. Was working fine last night. I login today and it's not working I changed no settings or anything. Anyone know what's wrong?

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

Just to be sure:
-change your IP to localhost (127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0)
-Make sure you portforwarded

Read full topic
